title: General Laws of the State of Idaho
additional-note: We know of no copyright renewals (or claims) for the state's official publication of its laws.  Some private parties may claim copyright for editions of Idaho law that they publish.  For example, some 'Idaho Code' volumes published by Bobbs-Merrill have annotations by editorial staff for which that company claimed copyright.  Renewals were filed for some of these volumes.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Felice Gollotti for copyright research on this title.
